lines.gurmukhi: Awid kY Anwid Ar AMiq kY AnMq Aiq pwr kY Apwr n AQwh Qwh pweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Kai Anaadi Ar Anti Kai Anant Ati , Paar Kai Apaar N Adaah Daah Paaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As the imperishable God is beyond beginning though He is the beginning of all; as He is beyond end since He is the end of all; as He is beyond the farthest conceivable extent as He is unfathomable, so is the praise of the True Guru just like that of Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: imiq kY Aimiq Ar sMK kY AsMK puin lyK kY AlyK nhI qOl kY qOlweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Miti Kai Amiti Ar Sankh Kai Asankh Pouni , Laykh Kai Alaykh Nahee Taul Kai Taulaaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As the imperishable God is beyond measurement, beyond counting, beyond perception, beyondÂ· weighing; so is the praise of a True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: ArD aurD prjMq kY Apwr jMq Agm Agocr n mol kY mulweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Aradh Uradh Parajant Kai Apaar Janta , Agam Agochar N Mol Kai Mulaaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As the Almighty is limitless, inaccessible, beyond the perception of senses and evaluation, so is the praise of the True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: prmdBuq Ascrj ibsm Aiq Aibgiq giq siqgur kI bfweI hY ]71]
lines.transliteration_english: Paramadabhout Asacharaj Bisam Ati , Abigati Gati Satigur Kee Badaaee Hai ?71?

Shabad OS B.translation: As God Almighty is absolutely marvellous, astonishing and very strange, so is the praise of True Guru. (71)
